author: Jens Knutson
comment: Nearly perfect: minimal without being too weird or hard to read, and uses a smooth, sweeping second hand.  The only thing missing is complications support, and some little touch of color, maybe an option to change the color of the hour and minute circles?

author: Jeff Parvin
comment: Best I've used on my moto 360, and I've had one since release. It's elegant and easy to read, and I constantly get compliments from other people.
title: Best watch face I've used

author: David Colvin
comment: I like the simplicity and the animation seems to function very well. A few options would be nice like inverting the colors.

author: Josh H
comment: Elegant in its simplicity. Would like to see some color options added.
